gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, potentially leading to an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures and a rejection of the call to temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gluttony.question: Did you allow yourself to become overly attached to indulgent food and drink, rather than practicing moderation in your eating and drinking habits?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing someone's private affairs or faults, even if what was shared was true, that could cause them harm or scandal?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: such as Sunday , when it could have been avoided
impiety.question: Did I engage in paid work on a holy day, such as Sunday, when it could have been avoided?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

extracted_data_phrases: onto feelings of rage or nursed anger
anger.question: Have I held onto feelings of rage or nursed anger rather than seeking reconciliation in relationships, damaging my own heart, relationship with God, and interactions with others?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.

impurity.question: Have I used certain practices, substances, or objects to prevent pregnancy?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.
